name: Snowblind (Super 8)
description: From my series "Running from Something, Looking for Something", I wanted to explore the effects of being isolated from technology, throwing myself into a world of ethereal landscapes devoid of any intentions. Shot in Iceland, 2017, on a Braun Nizo Super 8 Camera, Kodak Tri-X film stock. (https://jonathanliu.net/running/) (2000 X 1370px)
